item.title: RT by @RamsgateMH: To name names, this was the HRH Psych Fest. Still not paid. The company is still selling tickets for future events. They do fests for 'all' the genres: goth, prog, sleaze(?!),punk, blues, etc. My tip: avoid. The alarm bells rang early and we ignored them, we're the stupid ones
item.dc:creator: @XeaglepissX
item.description:
